Release Version: ZMap 0.1.61
Release Date: 2 September 2009

(Last release was on 14/08/2009)

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved

ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapServerProtocol.h, zmapServer/zmapServer.c, zmapServer/zmapServer.h, zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c, zmapServer/zmapServerPrototype.h, zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c, zmapServer/das/dasServer.c, zmapServer/file/fileServer.c: make featuresets call return hash of source->featureset
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: remove redundant ifdef'd out code.
  • src/: zmapApp/zmapAppremote.c, zmapControl/zmapControl.c, zmapControl/zmapControlRemoteReceive.c: add request tag to xml.
  • src/zmapApp/zmapAppwindow.c: add id for xremote debug output.
  • src/zmapControl/remote/xremote_gui_test.c: Add xml request tag handler, add separate commands for zmap/view, add code to parse request.
  • src/zmapControl/remote/: zmapXRemote.c, zmapXRemote_P.h: improve debug message output so we can see who sends what.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapXRemoteUtils.c: turn debug on.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: make sure we have source to featureset mapping.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: add xml request tag, add align, block and featureset name support/checking, catch bad style and other errors.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView_P.h: add source to featureset hash.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: debug output.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: trivial debug change.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowRemoteReceive.c: add xml request, align, block tags. Add code for load features, needs testing.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowUtils.c: fix bad bugs in setting styles.
  • src/zmapXML/example_xml_writer.c: add xml request tag.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapXRemote.h: fix a few comments.
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2009_08_14.shtml: new zmap release notes for 14 August 2009
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2009_08_14.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 14/08/2009
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.22181/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: update comments to mirror code.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUtils.h, zmapUtils/zmapFileUtils.c: update debug macros + add function to get basename of __FILE__ macro.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlRemoteReceive.c: minor format changes + add missing xwid id to client register request.
  • src/zmapControl/remote/xremote_gui_test.c: improve error messages, add register client code.
  • src/zmapControl/remote/zmapXRemote_P.h: improve message macro to use existing utils macros.
  • src/zmapControl/remote/zmapXRemote.c: add better debug messages so we can see what's going on.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c: fix up our handling of homols, coords are always forward now.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureFormatInput.c: move repeatmasker to be an alignment not a basic feature.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureUtils.c: fix bad, bad memory overwriting bug..ugh.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureXML.c: TEMP FIX, MORE WORK TO BE DONE: we want align and block tags in xml, it's hacked for now.
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: Fix align parsing: gaps are all forward now and match strand is passed in gff.
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer_P.h: update min acedb server level for this code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: all homol coords forward now so change code to handle this.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: add block, align, featureset to xml, add xwid to register client, add source text to feature.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteSend.c: add response tags, move action to request block.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fix bugs in getting align data for feature info display.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: all homol coords are forward now so fix arithmetic for missing start/end and colinearity.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCollectionFeature.c: all homol coords are forwards nows so fix up code for this.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • wh/iupac.h: iupac.h moved to w9, it's only used in blx code.
  • w9/iupac.h: moved from wh as it's only used here.
  • w6/smap_.h: add func decs for new align handling functions.
  • w6/smapgapped.c: add new file to contain all the smap gapped align code.
  • w6/smap.c: move all gapped code to smapgapped.c, add new params to calls to gapped code to suuport align strings.
  • w7/fmap_.h: add fields to homol struct to handle gapped align strings, e.g. cigar.
  • w7/fmapfeatures.c: add support for extended exblx format which has strand and gaps information.
  • w7/fmapsegdump.c: add code to handle gaps align string (cigar) and output strand for match sequence.
  • w7/fmapsegdumpgff.c: add code to dump match coords as per ref coords but also strand. Make repeatmasker and align, not a repeat.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: support passing align strings through without mapping them.
  • w9/blixem_.h: add some new versions of existing translate/revcomp funcs, more work to do here.
  • w9/blxFetch.c: use new func to put sequence into msp's, supports reverse strand match sequence.
  • w9/blxparser.c: Add parser code for extended exblx format which had match strand and now contains gaps, exlbx format has not gaps now. support match strand. reorder functions.
  • w9/blxview.c: add support for reversed match strands, changes to msp and drawing code. needs further testing.
  • w9/: dotter.c, dotterMain.c: change func. names for complement and translate to new versions.
  • w9/translate.c: add new funcs to do complementing and stuff, rename some functions to avoid name clashes.
  • wh/blxview.h: add some useful strand test macros and support for extended exblx format.
  • wh/fmapsegdump.h: add fields to support align strings.
  • wh/smap.h: add support for align strings.
  • wmake/truemake: add smapgapped to build and also a clean target.
